summary: The diff shows modifications to PortfolioGallery.tsx that address the broken image paths by updating image references to use the /assets/generated/ public path format. However, the diff is truncated and doesn't show all 120 images across all 4 categories, making it impossible to verify complete implementation of the requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all 120 images (30 per category) display properly across all 4 categories
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only 16 images in the Home category before truncation. Cannot verify that all 30 images per category (120 total) across Home, Commercial, Office, and Hotels categories are implemented

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify image filenames match exact generated filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include the actual contents of frontend/public/assets/generated directory or a complete listing of all image filenames used in the component due to truncation. Cannot verify exact filename matching for all 120 images
